snippet: The bus, en route to Niagara Falls from New York City, collided with a tractor-trailer on Interstate 380 in the Pocono Mountain region, the authorities said.
abstract: Charter bus carrying Italian tourists from New York City to Niagara Falls collides with tractor-trailer in Pennsylvania, killing bus driver and two others; four passengers are left in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: The bus, en route to Niagara Falls from New York City, collided with a tractor-trailer on Interstate 380 in the Pocono Mountain region, the authorities said.

headline.main: Bus Carrying Italian Tourists Crashes in Pennsylvania; 3 Die
headline.print_headline: Bus Carrying Italian Tourists Crashes; 3 Die
